SEARCH

Serialized Form

  • Package org.example.gui.component.jcomponents

    • Class org.example.gui.component.jcomponents.ComboBox

      class ComboBox extends JComboBox implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • comboBoxMultiCellEditor
          ComboBox.ComboBoxMultiCellEditor comboBoxMultiCellEditor
          The custom editor for the combo box.

          This editor is responsible for displaying the selected items in a scrollable panel. It provides methods to add and remove items dynamically based on user actions.

        • comboList
          Component comboList
          A reference to the JList component used for rendering the dropdown list of items.

          This component is updated whenever the combo box's list cell renderer is accessed.

        • selectedItems
          List<Object> selectedItems
          The list of selected items in the combo box.

          This list stores all the items currently selected by the user. The selected items are used to update the editor panel and the renderer dynamically.

    • Class org.example.gui.component.jcomponents.PageMenuIndicator

      class PageMenuIndicator extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • indicatorColor
          Color indicatorColor
          The default color used for the page indicators. This color is applied to the current page indicator. The default value is a green color (#16a34a).
        • label
          JLabel label
          A JLabel used to display the page number or any relevant information about the page status.
        • pageNumber
          int pageNumber
          The current page number. It tracks the active page and determines the corresponding indicator. The value is wrapped around if it exceeds the total number of pages.

    • Class org.example.gui.component.jcomponents.PasswordStrengthStatus

      class PasswordStrengthStatus extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • documentListener
          DocumentListener documentListener
          A DocumentListener attached to the password field to detect changes in the password input. It listens for insertions, deletions, or changes in the password field's content.
        • label
          JLabel label
          A JLabel that displays the password strength status (e.g., weak, moderate, or strong). It is dynamically updated as the password field content changes.
        • passwordField
          JPasswordField passwordField
          The JPasswordField where the user inputs their password. This field is monitored to track changes in the password for updating the strength status.
        • type
          int type
          An integer that represents the current strength of the password. The value is 1 for weak, 2 for moderate, and 3 for strong.

    • Class org.example.gui.pages.login.VerificationForm

      class VerificationForm extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • codeFields
          JTextField[] codeFields
          Array of JTextFields to hold the 6 individual digits of the verification code input.
        • email
          String email
          The email address associated with the verification process.
        • generatedCode
          String generatedCode
          The generated verification code that the user must enter to verify their identity.
        • is2FALogin
          boolean is2FALogin
          Boolean flag to indicate whether the verification is part of a 2FA login process.
        • submitBtn
          JButton submitBtn
          JButton that triggers the verification process when clicked.
        • title
          JLabel title
          JLabel to display the title or instruction for the verification process.

  • Package org.example.gui.pages.main

    • Class org.example.gui.pages.main.DashboardForm

      class DashboardForm extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • buttonPanel
          JPanel buttonPanel
          Panel containing action buttons.
        • courseName
          JComboBox[] courseName
          ComboBox array for course name selection.
        • courses
          String[] courses
          List of all available courses.
        • data
          String[][] data
          Matrix representation of recommended courses.
        • editButton
          JButton editButton
          Button to toggle edit mode.
        • gradeEditMap
          Map<JButton,String[]> gradeEditMap
          Map to associate edit buttons with grade data.
        • isEditing
          boolean isEditing
          Flag to determine if editing mode is active.
        • logoutBtn
          JButton logoutBtn
          Logout button for exiting the dashboard.
        • name
          String name
          Full name of the logged-in user.
        • panel
          JPanel panel
          Main content panel of the dashboard.
        • question
          int question
          Current question index for quiz functionality.
        • takeQuizButton
          JButton takeQuizButton
          Button to initiate the quiz.
        • user
          User user
          The logged-in user.
        • username
          String username
          Username of the logged-in user.
        • userResponses
          HashMap<String,String> userResponses
          User's responses stored as key-value pairs.
        • welcomeLabel
          JLabel welcomeLabel
          Welcome label displayed at the top of the dashboard.

        • nextButton
          JButton nextButton
          Button that proceeds to the next step in the process.

          JLabel questionTitle
          Label displaying the title of the section.

    • Class org.example.gui.pages.quiz.Form1

      class Form1 extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • backButton
          JButton backButton
          The button that allows the user to navigate to the previous question.
        • contentPanel
          JPanel contentPanel
          The main content panel that holds the components of the form.
        • grade10Button
          JCheckBox grade10Button
          The checkbox for selecting Grade 10.
        • grade11Button
          JCheckBox grade11Button
          The checkbox for selecting Grade 11.
        • grade12Button
          JCheckBox grade12Button
          The checkbox for selecting Grade 12.
        • grade9Button
          JCheckBox grade9Button
          The checkbox for selecting Grade 9.
        • indicator
          PageMenuIndicator indicator
          The page menu indicator that visually represents the current question number in the form.
        • nextButton
          JButton nextButton
          The button that allows the user to navigate to the next question.
        • question
          int question
          The current question number being displayed in the form.
        • questionTitle
          JLabel questionTitle
          The label that displays the current question number.
        • userResponses
          HashMap<String,String> userResponses
          A map to store user responses, where the key is the question identifier and the value is the user's answer.

    • Class org.example.gui.pages.quiz.Form3

      class Form3 extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • answerArea
          JTextArea answerArea
          The text area for entering the user's response to the current question.
        • backButton
          JButton backButton
          The button used to go back to the previous question.
        • indicator
          PageMenuIndicator indicator
          The indicator for the page menu, showing the current question's progress.
        • nextButton
          JButton nextButton
          The button used to move to the next question.
        • question
          int question
          The current question number being displayed.
        • questionTitle
          JLabel questionTitle
          The label displaying the current question title.
        • userResponses
          HashMap<String,String> userResponses
          A map to store the user's responses to the questions. The key is the question identifier, and the value is the user's response.

    • Class org.example.gui.pages.quiz.Form4

      class Form4 extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • answerArea
          JTextArea answerArea
          The text area where the user can enter their answer for the current question.
        • backButton
          JButton backButton
          The button that allows the user to move to the previous question.
        • indicator
          PageMenuIndicator indicator
          The page menu indicator that shows the current page number in the form.
        • nextButton
          JButton nextButton
          The button that allows the user to move to the next question.
        • question
          int question
          The current question number in the form sequence.
        • questionTitle
          JLabel questionTitle
          The label that displays the current question title (e.g., "Question #1").
        • userResponses
          HashMap<String,String> userResponses
          A map that stores the user responses, with the question identifiers as keys and the responses as values.

    • Class org.example.gui.pages.quiz.Form5

      class Form5 extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • backButton
          JButton backButton
          A JButton for navigating to the previous page in the quiz. This button is used for going back to the previous question in the form.
        • courseComboBox
          ComboBox courseComboBox
          A ComboBox component used to display the dropdown menu of courses. This allows the user to select from a list of available courses.
        • indicator
          PageMenuIndicator indicator
          A PageMenuIndicator component that shows the current page number of the quiz. It helps users navigate through the form by visually indicating which page they are on.
        • isSubmitClicked
          boolean isSubmitClicked
          A flag that tracks whether the "Submit" button has been clicked. It prevents multiple submissions by disabling the button once clicked.
        • nextButton
          JButton nextButton
          A JButton for navigating to the next page in the quiz. This button will be enabled or disabled based on user actions.
        • question
          int question
          The current question number in the quiz. It helps track the progression of the form.
        • questionTitle
          JLabel questionTitle
          A JLabel to display the title of the current question. The title will dynamically update based on the current question number.
        • userResponses
          HashMap<String,String> userResponses
          A HashMap to store the user's responses to the quiz questions. The key is the question identifier, and the value is the user's response.
